subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Jets’ return to the playoffs was cut short as first-year coach Eric Mangini was outfoxed by his mentor, Bill Belichick, and his players were outclassed in a loss to the New England Patriots.
snippet: The Jets’ return to the playoffs was cut short as first-year coach Eric Mangini was outfoxed by his mentor, Bill Belichick, and his players were outclassed in a loss to the New England Patriots.
